episodes.title: 'Larry Ray got her to do things.' Lawyer says Sarah Lawrence cult 'lieutenant' is a victim | News 12
episodes.description:
David K. Bertan is the lawyer for Isabella Pollok. He says the so-called "lieutenant" of the Sarah Lawrence sex cult is also a victim of mastermind Larry Ray. Bertan acknowledges Pollok was an enabler for an abuser, but says she was "dragged into this" and under Ray's complete control.

"Sex, Lies & Terror: Sarah Lawrence" premieres on News 12 Dec. 6 at 9:30P.
